nodes.text: Berd Fleet was a fleet of freighters organized by the Rebel Alliance and led by Luke Skywalker to land on Harix to rescue several schoolchildren from the Empire.

When arriving at Harix, Berd Fleet split up among its forces, while Luke with his starship left behind several Target Drones in their place to trick the Empire's forces into believing that they had a much larger force than usual while the real landing party would land on the planet with little difficulty.
